name: like a hot knife through butter
name_original: like a hot knife through butter
description:
Controls
  • Click and drag the butter
  • Z / R: undo / reset
  • Escape: try a different level
Credits
  • Game by pancelor, made for the Astra Idiom Jam
  • Guest levels by Michael Kamm, Patrick, and Le Slo
  • Itch background art by Tally
  • Bread sprite help from Geegaz
  • Playtesting by Tally and Incnone
  • Tools used:
    • https://github.com/auroriax/PuzzleScriptPlus
    • https://github.com/broken-sign-games/PuzzleScript
    • https://github.com/pancelor/aseprite-puzzlescript-export
